ĞÑ€Ğ¸Ñ€ÑƒÑ Ñ Ğ´Ñ€ÑƒĞ·ÑŒÑĞ¼Ğ¸, Ğ¿Ğ»Ğ°Ñ‡Ñƒ Ñ Ğ´Ñ€ÑƒĞ³Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğ¸ Ñ€Ğ°Ğ½Ğ´Ğ¾Ğ¼Ğ°Ğ¼Ğ¸. Ğ—Ğ°Ğ±Ğ°Ğ²Ğ½Ğ¾ Ñ‡Ñ‚Ğ¾ Ğ¼Ğ°Ğ½ÑŒÑĞº Ğ²Ğ¸Ğ´Ğ¸Ñ‚ Ğ¾Ñ‚ Ğ¿ĞµÑ€Ğ²Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¾ Ğ»Ğ¸Ñ†Ğ°. Ğ˜Ğ³Ñ€Ğ° Ğ¾Ñ‡ĞµĞ½ÑŒ ĞºÑ€ÑƒÑ‚Ğ°Ñ, ĞºÑ‚Ğ¾ Ğ½Ğµ Ğ¸Ğ³Ñ€Ğ°Ğ» ÑĞ¾Ğ²ĞµÑ‚ÑƒÑ.

This game is the kind of game that is easy to learn, hard to master. The asymetrical nature of the gameplay makes it hard for both sides to consistantly do well. but when you do get the hang of things the game is aboslutely lovely. 

The killers are fun and unique, and so are the different survivors in the game. Each charecter brings something different to the table and whichever perks you bring can completely change youre experiance from game to game. 

When i first saw the game, it was conviced it would be "for me". since "horror" games never was really fun for me. But i decided to try this anyways, and i have Zero regrets... well... besides for all the time i have spent that could have been spent learning a life skill...

The game keeps getting updated, with new killers, survivors and maps. 

Anytime is a great time to jump in! 
Very fun game. Would reccomend to anyone to at least try.
Fun game but Matchmaking could be better.

Was dubious about purchasing this game,
But it is acctualy really fun.
It's the kind of game that you might not think you will enjoy until you try it.

Can be pretty scary, especialy when Mike Myers is stalking you without you realising it.
Massacring the survivors as a killer is fun >:)
Out playing the killer as a survivor is super rewarding.
every game is different, every map presents a new challenge.

LACK OF DEDICATED SERVERS is a BIG negative, the game uses peer to peer systems with the killer hosting the game.
If he has a bad connection or is from a remote country everyone is screwed.
Devs need to chip out and pay for dedicated servers will improve the game vastly.

I bought this game while it was on sale for Halloween
And because my friend was very pursuasive at advertising the game, it is a lot of fun with friends.

This game is incredible and horrifying fun! The graphics are ominously spectacular and the music and ambience is kind of what you'd expect from a game like this, but it surpasses even that. The mechanics of using Offerings and leveling up your character is an interesting one, but it's not all that bad, it's quite enjoyable and rewarding when you do a good job at escaping the monster or sacrificing the survivors. All in all, I'd totally play this as often as possible. As an asymmetrical multiplayer horror, it's fantastic!

not that bad
**

The game is fun for a while, but when you are playing, you will rank up and will go with some wanabepro, some of them are very rude, they will make your game a very bad experience, those peoples will abuse bugs/exploits, if you kill them you will be reported for lag switching or others reasons and they will become a keyboard warrior in the chat, if you not kill them they will tell you some nice words too.
The Dev team is very good, they are still add some news killers and survivors, trying to improve their game, even if sometime they can release something a bit too fast and will be removed when players will find out some good exploits or when so many peoples were whining about it.

Toxicity 4.5 / 5
Gameplay 4/5
Dev 4/5
